resources.string: Plan for creation: This will be the searchscreen. A search function will then show the song/songs, starting while the user is typing, in a list if applicable. The song can be selected and then started by clicking on the player button. it will show songs in the library and other songs. they will be marked which is which. The discover button picks a random song and plays it.

This will be the area displaying the album or single cd cover of the song, the name of the song and will have the media player in it which will feature the options to go rewind/forward the song and stop/play the song. Atop it has like the other screens before buttons leading to other parts of the app. getRessource would be needed to fetch the data and feed it to display the song name and play the song itself.
This screen is going to display the list of all downloaded songs in a scroll view. It will use the getResourse function
